This clock tower is likely the Big Ben clock tower, located in London, England. It is the world's largest four-faced, chiming clock and is the third-tallest free-standing clock tower in the world. The tower was completed in 1859 and stands at a height of 316 feet.

This clock tower is likely the Big Ben clock tower in London, England. The tower is 96 meters tall and houses a 13-ton bell known as "Big Ben". It is the largest four-faced chiming clock in the world and is a major tourist attraction in the city.
